TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BamlLocalizabilityResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: バイナリ XAML (BAML) のクラスとプロパティのローカライズ可能な設定を解決します。

span.span: Resolves localizable settings for classes and properties in binary XAML (BAML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使って、クラスやプロパティのローカライズ設定を解決するために[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]します。 is used by the in order to resolve localizability settings for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]. 両方のリソースの抽出、およびローカライズされた時に競合回避モジュールが呼び出されます[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]が更新されます。The resolver is called both at the time of resource extraction as well as when localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated. リソースの抽出時に ()、競合回避モジュール。At the time of resource extraction (), the resolver: - 提供クラスやプロパティの[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]ときに、ローカライズ可能なリソースを作成しています。Provides for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] when the is constructing localizable resources. - 内の要素の書式設定を提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]要素はインライン タグとして書式設定するようにします。Provides formatting preferences for elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] so elements are formatted as inline tags. 時刻をローカライズする at[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]が更新されます ()、競合回避モジュール。At the time at which localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated (), the resolver: - クラスに書式設定タグを解決します。Resolves formatting tags back into classes. - クラス定義を含むアセンブリの名前を解決します。Resolves the name of the assembly that contains class definition. - クラスの関数の実際の方法を実行する内部クラスによってサブクラス化はします。 is subclassed by an internal class that performs the practical aspects of the class functions for .

related.span: LocBaml ツール サンプル

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: クラスの新しいインスタンスを初期化します。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability (string assembly, string className);

Public MustOverride Function GetElementLocalizability (assembly As String, className As String) As ElementLocalizability

abstract member GetElementLocalizability : string * string -> System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability

param.name: assembly
param.span: ローカライズする[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] を格納するアセンブリの完全名。

span.span: The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.

param.name: className
param.span: ローカライズ情報の取得対象となる要素の完全クラス名。

span.span: The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.

summary.span: 指定した型の要素がローカライズ可能かどうか、およびローカライズ可能な場合はインラインの書式設定が可能かどうかを示す値を返します。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified type of element can be localized and, if so, whether it can be formatted inline.

returns.span: 指定したアセンブリおよび要素のローカライズ情報を格納するオブジェクト。

span.span: An object that contains the localizability information for the specified assembly and element.

summary.span: 指定した型の要素の指定したプロパティがローカライズ可能かどうかを示す値を返します。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified property of a specified type of element can be localized.

returns.span: プロパティがローカライズ可能かどうかやどのようにローカライズされるかを指定するオブジェクト。

span.span: An object that specifies whether and how the property can be localized.

Public MustOverride Function ResolveFormattingTagToClass (formattingTag As String) As String
public: abstract System::String ^ ResolveFormattingTagToClass(System::String ^ formattingTag);
abstract member ResolveFormattingTagToClass : string -> string

summary.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] で検出されなかった [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] タグの完全クラス名を返します。

span.span: Returns the full class name of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] tag that has not been encountered in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].

returns.span: タグに関連付けられている完全クラス名。

span.span: The full class name associated with the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドが呼び出されます、または同等がローカライズ可能なリソースへの置換を適用します。This method is called when a or an equivalent is applying substitutions to localizable resources. 代替文字列で書式設定タグが発生した場合は、書式設定タグをクラス名に解決するこのメソッドが呼び出されます。If a formatting tag is encountered in the substitutions, this method is called to resolve the formatting tag back to a class name.
